External_Sourceable_AbstractObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

External_Sourceable_AbstractObjectID.type: WID,  Contingent_Worker_ID,  External_Sourceable_ID,  File_ID,  Internal_Service_Provider_ID,  Internal_Service_Provider_Reference_ID,  Requisition_ID_External,  Requisition_Number,  Supplier_Change_ID,  Supplier_Contract_ID,  Supplier_Contract_ID_External,  Supplier_ID,  Supplier_Invoice_Adjustment_Reference_ID,  Supplier_Invoice_Reference_ID,  Supplier_Reference_ID
External_Sourceable_AbstractObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.
